Now you can connect to cities in the United States, United Kingdom, France, Spain, and Italy!
With over 3,200 servers in 80 countries, our virtual locations allow you to securely access your favorite apps and website from anywhere in the world.
Navigate the internet with confidence with Hotspot Shield VPN.

Access the top security apps for free, included in your Premium subscription. Just open Hotspot Shield and activate any of the following apps:

- Robo Shield: Stop annoying robocalls from spamming your phone.
- 1Password: Keep your passwords safe across multiple devices.
- Identity Guard: Safeguard your digital and financial identity.

Be sure to check out all the security apps and let us know what you think at support@hotspotshield.com

What’s new with us? We got a fresh new look that we know you will love!

We also heard your awesome suggestions and made it easier for you to connect to your favorite locations. Now you can select any virtual location before connecting to one of our VPN servers.

Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming.

Enjoy!
We’re always working to improve Hotspot Shield with bug fixes and optimizations. Whenever we add awesome new features, we’ll let you know!
- Improved user experience and connection quality
We polished and optimized our app for better performance and squashed some bugs during the process

In this update, we optimized your VPN connection for better speed and reliability. We also fixed a few things to make the app easier to use.
Thank you for using Hotspot Shield VPN!

Subscribers to Hotspot Shield Premium now get access to more privacy and security apps for free through Pango — a service that protects you online so you can go about your life with peace of mind.
 
Pango includes Hotspot Shield Premium as well as apps like: 
- Robo Shield Spam Call Blocker: Stop annoying robocalls from spamming your phone, and stay safe from scammers trying to steal your personal information.
- 1Password: Keep your passwords safe across multiple devices from hackers trying to access your accounts.
- Identity Guard: Safeguard your digital and financial identity from the constant risk of theft and fraud.

Navigate the Internet with confidence thanks to Hotspot Shield Premium, now part of Pango!

Now you can connect to cities in the United States, United Kingdom, France, Spain, and Italy!
With over 3,200 servers in 80 countries, our virtual locations allow you to securely access your favorite apps and website from anywhere in the world.
Navigate the internet with confidence with Hotspot Shield VPN.

Access the top security apps for free, included in your Premium subscription. Just open Hotspot Shield and activate any of the following apps:

- Robo Shield: Stop annoying robocalls from spamming your phone.
- 1Password: Keep your passwords safe across multiple devices.
- Identity Guard: Safeguard your digital and financial identity.

Be sure to check out all the security apps and let us know what you think at support@hotspotshield.com

We’re excited to inform you that Hotspot Shield has joined forces with Aura, a company on a mission to simplify security and privacy for everyone. 

What’s new with this version:

 • New look, same great features. Enjoy all the VPN features and services you love, now with a fresh new look. 
 • Privacy you can trust. Our commitment to your privacy and security is as strong as ever before, and our privacy commitments to you remain the same.
 • Amazing things to come. Expect new, powerful innovations to help you safe online to come your way. 

Thanks, and we hope you enjoy this new version.

Did you know that included with your Hotspot Shield Premium subscription, you also get a free subscription to even more security products? 

Now you can easily redeem your free subscriptions to Robo Shield, 1Password, and Identity Guard from within the app. Be sure to subscribe to all the best security products included with your Premium subscription today!
